      • initParsing

        public void initParsing(java.lang.String sourcepath,
               java.lang.String destfilename,
               java.lang.String trainpath,
               java.lang.String modelfile,
               DictHandling dicthandler,
               ClassificationMethod method,
               FeatureSets featureset,
               TransliterationMethod transliterationMethod,
               CharTypes chartype,
               TestMethod testMethod,
               java.lang.Boolean arffOrBiGram)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        WekaException
        Initializes parameters needed for parsing.
        Parameters:
        sourcepath - The path of the original file to classify (usually found in the testdata folder)
        destfilename - The path of the result file to manifest (usually to be in the results folder)
        trainpath - The path of trainingdata to use for the specific method (trainingdata may or may not be in the desired format yet)
        dicthandler - the dicthandler to use
        method - the classification method to use
        featureset - the featureset to use (if any)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        WekaException
